title: Passive Voice
description: Learn to use the passive voice to focus on the action or result rather than who does it.

rules.title: Passive Voice Structure
rules.explanation: The passive is formed with 'be + past participle'. Use it when the action is more important than who does it, or when we don't know who did it.
rules.structure: Subject + be (conjugated) + past participle (+ by agent)

rules.title: Present Simple Passive
rules.explanation: Use 'am/is/are + past participle' for regular actions, facts, or general truths.

examples.sentence: Millions of photos are uploaded every day.
Personal data is stored on secure servers.
Emails are sent automatically by the system.

rules.title: Past Simple Passive
rules.explanation: Use 'was/were + past participle' for completed actions in the past.

examples.sentence: These features were added in the latest update.
My account was hacked last month.

rules.title: Present Perfect Passive
rules.explanation: Use 'have/has been + past participle' to connect past actions to the present.

examples.sentence: Your password has been reset successfully.
Several new features have been announced.

rules.title: Future Passive
rules.explanation: Use 'will be + past participle' for future passive actions.

examples.sentence: The new version will be released next month.
examples.translation: 새 버전은 다음 달에 출시될 것이다.

examples.sentence: Users will be notified about the changes.
examples.translation: 사용자들은 변경 사항에 대해 알림을 받을 것이다.

examples.sentence: Your order will be delivered within 3 days.

rules.title: Modal Passive
rules.explanation: Use 'modal + be + past participle' when combining modals with passive voice.

examples.sentence: The file can be downloaded for free.
examples.translation: 그 파일은 무료로 다운로드할 수 있다.

examples.sentence: This video might be blocked in some countries.
examples.translation: 이 동영상은 일부 국가에서 차단될 수 있다.

exercises.question: The app _____ by millions of people worldwide.
This software _____ be used without permission.

exercises.active: They will announce the results tomorrow.
exercises.passive: The results will be announced tomorrow.

exercises.active: People share millions of posts every day.
exercises.passive: Millions of posts are shared every day.
